verbose_text: There are studies showing that IFN-gamma inhibits the migration of human cytotrophoblasts in a natural killer cells dose dependent manner and blocks trophoblast invasion, like in the early alterations in the placentation process, which may be related to the origin of the pre-eclampsia [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IFN-gamma inhibits the migration of human cytotrophoblasts in a natural killer cells dose-dependent manner and blocks trophoblast invasion
